issue.title: [FlightRPC] Ensure headers are uniformly exposed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8858](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8858). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Java: MetadataAdapter should support iterating through binary headers
- Python: binary headers need to be present in the output

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8858?focusedCommentId=17130942) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7224
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7224>
